Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: David Dickens
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my wife for use at a wedding.  When we got it we found that it was more than what we bargained for.  Takes great pictures and High Def. videos.  Great Product at a Great Price!

Reviews.Title: perfect satisfaction
Reviews.Author: aja guthrie
Reviews.Content: this was more than i expected! everything is in excellent working order. im always leary with ordering online. there was no need for concern with this seller!

Reviews.Title: Prompt delivery
Reviews.Author: Latha Vrittamani
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter who needed it for lab.  She was so thrilled when she got it.  She loved all the goodies it came with.  Very prompt delivery, ahead of schedule.  Sony is the best!  Thanks, Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Caron Miller
Reviews.Content: The camera works really well.  Takes great pictures and video .  Easy to handle.  The only problem is the wi-fi.  I can't seem to transfer the video and pictures to my phone.  I get half way through and it won't finish.Also I didn't receive the flash drive with my package

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: rhonda
Reviews.Content: Was Christmas gift for my 17 year old granddaughter and she loves it. Used it all day to capture memories of our family holiday.

Reviews.Title: nice camera and kit
Reviews.Author: Larry W. Frye
Reviews.Content: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX80/W 16.2MP Wi-Fi Digital Camera with 8x Optical Zoom...real nice camera with all the extras that are in the kit

Reviews.Title: Nice camera worth this price
Reviews.Author: Jiang Shaopeng
Reviews.Content: It's a bit hard to hold it if you have a relatively big hand. However it's easy to take it when you go outside

ProductInfo.Features:
8x optical zoom plus 16x Clear Image Digital Zoom
16.2MP images with stunning low-light performance
Wi-Fi sharing to upload photos and videos
Case design may vary
Optical Image stabilization with 2-way active mode for smoother videos
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX80/W 16.2MP Wi-Fi Digital Camera with 8x Optical Zoom in White + Sony 32GB SDHC Class 10 + Sony Camera Case + Replacement NP-BN1 Battery + USB Card Reader + Accessory Kit
